```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(rgl)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)

```

## Simplexes


```{r}

p <- tibble(x = 0.2, y = 0.2, z = 0.4)

plot3d(p$x, p$y, p$z, col = rainbow(nrow(p)))

```

```{r}

  open3d()
  x <- sort(rnorm(1000))
  y <- rnorm(1000)
  z <- rnorm(1000) + atan2(x, y)
  plot3d(x, y, z, col = rainbow(1000))

```

```{r}

open3d()
  n <- 1000

  x <- runif(n, 0, 1)
  y <- runif(n, 0, 1)
  z <- 1 - x - y
  
  plot3d(x, y, z, col = rainbow(n))
  
  # hierdie gee 'n surface.. 'n vlak... dis ook nie wat ek soek nie... ek soek 'n simplex

```

```{r}

n <- 1000

points <- matrix(NA, n, 3)

for (i in 1:n) {
  
  r = runif(2, 0, 1)
  r = sort(r)
  
  x = r[1]
  y = r[2] - r[1]
  z = 1 - r[2]
  
  points[i, 1] <- x
  points[i, 2] <- y
  points[i, 3] <- z
  
}

points[1:5,] %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  rename(X = V1) %>% 
  rename(Y = V2) %>% 
  rename(Z = V3) %>% 
  mutate(tot = X + Y + Z)


```

```{r}

plot3d(x = points[,1], y = points[,2], z = points[,3], col = rainbow(n))

# TADAAA!! Beautiful!

```
